original_text: Thus says the Lord to me, “Go and buy a linen loincloth and put it around your waist, and do not dip it in water.”
korean_text: 여호와께서 이와 같이 내게 이르시되 너는 가서 베 띠를 사서 네 허리에 띠고 물에 적시지 말라 하시기로

sentences.original_text: Thus says the Lord to me
Go and buy a linen loincloth
and put it around your waist
and do not dip it in water
